name: Modules.LDAP.Connection
summary: The connection object provides access to the LDAP operations.

methods.name: connect
methods.summary: Initializes a connection to the specified LDAP server, starting TLS if necessary.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.summary: A string containing the uri of the server.

parameters.name: success
parameters.summary: A callback function that is executed if the request succeeds

parameters.name: error
parameters.summary: A callback function that is executed if the request fails

methods.name: saslBind
methods.summary: Performs an LDAP SASL bind request and returns a Request object. A SASL bind includes a SASL mechanism name and optional set of credentials.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary: An object that specifies properties for the request

parameters.name: success
parameters.summary: A callback function that is executed if the request succeeds

parameters.name: error
parameters.summary: A callback function that is executed if the request fails

methods.name: search
methods.summary: Performs a search on an LDAP directory server and returns a Request object. If the search is successful, a SearchResult object is returned in the result property of the success callback.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary: An object that specifies properties for the request

parameters.name: success
parameters.summary: A callback function that is executed if the request succeeds

parameters.name: error
parameters.summary: A callback function that is executed if the request fails

methods.name: simpleBind
methods.summary: Performs an LDAP simple bind operation, which authenticates using a bind DN and password, and returns a request object.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary: An object that specifies properties for the request

parameters.name: success
parameters.summary: A callback function that is executed if the request succeeds

parameters.name: error
parameters.summary: A callback function that is executed if the request fails

properties.name: sizeLimit
properties.summary: The maximum size in bytes for an LDAP message that a connection will attempt to read from the directory server, or 0 if no limit will be enforced.

properties.name: timeLimit
properties.summary: The maximum length of time (in seconds) that a request should be allowed to continue before giving up.

properties.name: useTLS
properties.summary: Indicates whether to use TLS when sending requests to the LDAP server
